name: Demon Slime Blob
descrip: A small tingly blob of gooey purple slime residue that wobbles playfully when you touch it. Used as a demonic aphrodisiac.
useOutcome: |f|ApplyStatusEffect|/|Aphrodisiac|n|You apply the slimey substance onto your skin and find that it seeps into your pores. Your skin begins to tingle arousingly, and you find your cock is ready to fuck the next thing it sees.
